item.title: 美联储贴现窗口需要 "更多努力 "提高银行参与度
item.description: 美联储已采取措施，减少长期以来困扰其贴现窗口的污名，但最近的调查显示，银行仍对使用这一关键的支持机制犹豫不决。【原文：The Federal Reserve has taken steps to reduce the stigma that has long plagued its discount window, though recent surveys indicate banks are still hesitant to use the key backstop facility.】

item.title: 高盛集团的贝尔称英国股市需要本地资金来阻止移民潮
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：UK investors need to start allocating more capital to domestic stocks or London risks seeing more companies relist abroad or be taken private, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 加拿大将终止养老基金投资 30% 股权限制
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将终止目前限制养老基金持有加拿大实体 30% 股份的规定，作为刺激更多国内投资计划的一部分。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government is set to end a rule that currently limits pension fund stakes to 30% of Canadian entities, as part of a plan to spur more domestic investment.】

item.title: 樱桃热潮让智利预测农业出货量将创历史新高
item.description: 水果出口大国智利预计，由于气候适宜和亚洲主导的强劲需求，下一季度的农业出货量将创下历史新高。【原文：Fruit-exporting powerhouse Chile expects to register record agriculture shipments in the coming season on favorable weather and strong Asia-led demand.】

item.title: 联合健康首席执行官谋杀案中再次出现 "无炸弹者 "宣言
item.description:
思想继续在网上传播。【原文：

The ideas continue to spread online.

】

item.title: 广播公司辛克莱正在与贷款人商谈融资 10 亿美元事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，辛克莱公司（Sinclair Inc.【原文：Sinclair Inc. and some of its lenders are hashing out a proposal to raise more than $1 billion in new financing to pay down some of its debt, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 巴西财政困难引发货币大跌，巴西央行出手干预
item.description: 在巴西财政前景恶化导致货币市场大跌之际，巴西央行介入了货币市场。【原文：Brazil’s central bank stepped into currency markets amid a selloff driven by the nation’s deteriorating fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 中国限制镓出口，镓价格升至 2011 年以来最高点
item.description: 在中国最近实施出口限制之后，用于半导体和先进技术的金属镓的价格跃升至 2011 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Prices for gallium — a metal used in semiconductors and advanced technology — jumped to their highest level since 2011 following export restrictions recently imposed by China.】

item.title: 必和必拓寻求在巴西实现增长，摆脱矿难阴影
item.description: 全球最大的矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）正寻求在巴西扩张，以摆脱 2015 年的矿难。【原文：BHP Group, the world’s biggest miner, is looking to expand in Brazil as it seeks to move on from a 2015 mining disaster.】

item.title: 纽约市相对生活成本降至至少 2008 年以来最低点
item.description: 至少 15 年来，纽约市的生活成本从未如此低廉过。【原文：It hasn’t been this cheap to live in New York City in at least 15 years — that is, when you compare it to the rest of the country.】

item.title: 卡拉-斯韦什尔和斯科特-加洛韦寻求与《Pivot》及其他播客达成八位数协议
item.description:
自 Vox Media 推出以商业为重点的计划以来，这对播客组合就一直与 Vox Media 合作

。【原文：

The podcaster duo have worked with Vox Media since the launch of their business-focused program

】

item.title: 德国监管机构调查电价飙升可能存在的滥用行为
item.description: 德国联邦网络局表示，正在调查与近期电价飙升有关的市场滥用指控。【原文：Germany’s Federal Network Agency said it’s investigating allegations of market abuse in connection with recent power price spikes.】

item.title: 佩洛西在欧洲国会之行中受伤住院
item.description: 众议院前议长南希-佩洛西（Nancy Pelosi）办公室周五在一份声明中宣布，她在卢森堡国会访问期间受伤住院。【原文：Former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was hospitalized after being injured during a congressional trip to Luxembourg, her office announced Friday in a statement.】

item.title: 加拿大命令邮政工人在长达一个月的罢工后重返工作岗位
item.description: 加拿大政府要求一个独立的劳工委员会命令加拿大邮政公司的 5.5 万名工人重返工作岗位，此举有望结束在繁忙的假日季节中断邮件服务近一个月的罢工。【原文：The Canadian government asked an independent labor board to order 55,000 Canada Post Corp. workers back to the job, a move that’s expected to end a strike that disrupted mail service for nearly a month during the busy holiday season.】

item.title: 对冲基金静观特朗普竞选誓言是否成为现实
item.description: 对冲基金在 2024 年穿越了动荡的股市，取得了丰厚的回报。但进入 2025 年后，由于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的政策充满了不确定性，对冲基金惶惶不安。【原文：Hedge funds navigated through a volatile stock market to post strong returns in 2024. But they’re on edge heading into 2025 as uncertainty swirls around President-elect Donald Trump’s policies.】

item.title: 据说 Textor 正在考虑将老鹰足球队股份出售给体育银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，足球俱乐部最活跃的投资者之一约翰-特斯托（John Textor）正在讨论向体育银行（Sportsbank）出售其旗下鹰足球控股有限公司（Eagle Football Holdings Ltd. ）投资工具股份的可能性。【原文：John Textor, one of the most active investors in football clubs, is discussing the potential sale of a stake in his Eagle Football Holdings Ltd. investment vehicle to Sportsbank, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 拉皮丹称，2035 年后油价将因需求而迎来新一轮繁荣
item.description: 据咨询公司 Rapidan Energy Group 称，由于中国和其他地区的需求持续增长，石油价格将从下一个十年中期开始进入一个新的繁荣期。【原文：Oil prices are set for a new boom period from the middle of the next decade on continued demand growth in China and elsewhere, according to consultants Rapidan Energy Group.】

item.title: 中国抑制金属需求后力拓有意在加拿大建镓厂
item.description: 在中国禁止向美国出口用于制造半导体、智能手机和电动汽车的稀有金属之后，力拓集团正在研究如何在加拿大生产镓。【原文：Rio Tinto Group is looking at ways to produce gallium in Canada after China moved to ban US-bound exports of the rare metal used to make semiconductors, smart phones and electric vehicles.】

item.title: Liquid 将融资 2.5 亿美元，打造受微型蠕虫大脑启发的人工智能
item.description:
本轮融资对这家初创公司的估值超过 20 亿美元。【原文：

The funding round values the startup at more than $2 billion. 

】

item.title: 随着 "X一代 "临近退休，许多人担心自己负担不起— 现在或将来
item.description:
"被遗忘的一代 "正准备离开劳动力大军，但一些人正在经历的经济紧缩却揭示了美国的主要金融问题。【原文：

The forgotten generation is preparing to leave the workforce, but the economic squeeze some are experiencing illuminates key financial issues in the US.

】

item.title: 亿万富翁萨利纳斯回购 Elektra 股票，财富得以恢复
item.description: 亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯（Ricardo Salinas）的埃莱克特拉集团（Grupo Elektra）上周股价暴跌 70%，随着该公司在本月底进行私有化投票前回购股权，其股价正在逐步回升。【原文：Shares in billionaire Ricardo Salinas’ Grupo Elektra are clawing their way back from a 70% rout last week as the company repurchases equity ahead of a vote to go private at the end of the month.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币项目正在购买价值数百万美元的小众代币
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的加密货币项目世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）似乎正在购买价值数百万美元的专用数字代币，因为人们越来越多地猜测，这个去中心化的金融借贷平台正接近投入运营。【原文：Donald Trump’s crypto project, World Liberty Financial, appears to be buying specialized digital tokens worth millions of dollars as speculation increases that the decentralized finance lending platform is moving closer to becoming operational.】

item.title: 全球最大的个人股票购买者迎来 1991 年以来最好的一年
item.description: 这一年，马克-扎克伯格 6 岁。在离扎克伯格日后孵化 "thefacebook "的哈佛大学宿舍不远的地方，一位年轻的股票经纪人找到了一份工作，而这份工作将成为扎克伯格一生中最重要的工作。【原文：It was the year Mark Zuckerberg turned 6. Not far from the Harvard dorm where Zuckerberg would one day hatch “thefacebook,” a young stock-picker landed what would become, quite literally, the job of a lifetime.】

item.title: 财政部长称欧盟债券可能对荷兰债务构成威胁
item.description: 荷兰财政机构负责人表示，如果欧盟债券被指数提供商重新归类为主权证券，可能会对荷兰债券构成威胁。【原文：European Union bonds could pose a threat to Dutch bonds if they are reclassified as sovereign securities by index providers, said the head of the nation’s treasury agency.】

item.title: 巫师 4》预告片缺乏首映时间表，CD Projekt 拉力赛停滞不前
item.description: CD Projekt SA 的股票在大宗交易中下跌，原因是这家波兰游戏工作室发布的《巫师 4》（The Witcher IV）的六分钟视频预告片没有包括任何首映时间表。【原文：Shares in CD Projekt SA dropped in heavy trading as the release of a six-minute video trailer of the Polish gaming studio’s upcoming release of The Witcher IV didn’t include any timeline for its premiere.】

item.title: 德国哈贝克对提前淘汰煤炭计划表示怀疑
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）对该国提前淘汰燃煤发电的计划提出了进一步的质疑。【原文：German Economy Minister Robert Habeck raised further doubts over the country’s plans for an early phase-out of coal-fired power generation.】

item.title: 卢拉 "闹剧"、央行全面介入，巴西市场 "松绑
item.description: 巴西市场周五下跌，为这个拉丁美洲最大经济体本周的动荡行情画上了句号。在大幅加息和总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）突发健康危机之后，巴西货币在全球同业中出现了一些最大幅度的上涨和一些最大幅度的下跌。【原文：Brazil markets fell on Friday, capping a turbulent week for Latin America’s largest economy that saw its currency post some of the sharpest gains — and some of the sharpest losses — among global peers in the aftermath of an outsize interest rate hike and President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s sudden health crisis.】

item.title: 叙利亚难民对重返家园感到困惑
item.description:
如果叙利亚难民大批返回祖国，土耳其也将面临难题。【原文：

Any en-masse return of Syrian refugees to their native land would represent a conundrum for Turkey, too.

】

item.title: 匈牙利和保加利亚讨论美国制裁俄罗斯天然气的变通办法
item.description: 匈牙利和保加利亚讨论了在美国对俄罗斯天然气公司（Gazprombank）实施制裁后如何确保俄罗斯天然气继续过境的问题。【原文：Hungary and Bulgaria discussed ways to ensure the continued transit of Russian natural gas after the US imposed sanctions on Gazprombank, which until now received payments and transferred transit fees after the commodity.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通过逮捕和突袭扩大对投票干预的调查
item.description: 在亲俄候选人卡林-乔治斯库（Calin Georgescu）令人震惊地赢得第一轮投票后，罗马尼亚当局扩大了对干预该国已被取消的总统选举的调查范围。【原文：Romanian authorities broadened an investigation into interference in the country’s annulled presidential elections following a shock victory by pro-Russian candidate Calin Georgescu in the first round of the vote.】
